section.title: line-through element
section.p: The <line-through> element indicates text that is rendered with a line struck through the content.
Line-through: DITA technology can be maddeninga challenge to implement.
Line-through: DITA technology can be maddeninga challenge to implement.

section.title: overline element
section.p: The <overline> element indicates content that is rendered with a line above it.
Overline: x is the average value of xi
